thread.title: ‘Oops!’ These governments ‘mistakenly’ sent welfare payments WHERE?
thread.title_full: ‘Oops!’ These governments ‘mistakenly’ sent welfare payments WHERE?

author: Doug P.
title: ‘Oops!’ These governments ‘mistakenly’ sent welfare payments WHERE?
text:
‘Oops!’ These governments ‘mistakenly’ sent welfare payments WHERE? Posted at 2:58   Doug P. 
What could possibly go wrong? #BREAKING European governments mistakenly paid taxpayer-funded welfare benefits to ISIS fighters https://t.co/VQ6zUhzS1u 
Big-government competence at its finest : 
Governments across Europe have accidentally paid taxpayer-funded welfare benefits such as unemployment funds, disability pensions and housing allowances to Islamic State militants who have used the money to wage war in Iraq and Syria, authorities and terrorism experts say. 
The report cites Sweden, France, Belgium and Great Britain as having “mistakenly” sent welfare benefits to people loyal to ISIS. 
— Andrew Malcolm (@AHMalcolm) February 23, 2017 "MISTAKENLY"…somethings simmering https://t.co/olnnm6Y0X8
